about_the_game:
PLEASE NOTE: Text style in the screenshots is subject to change, as the build is still under construction.



LAMUNATION -International- is a comedy visual novel featuring all that is good and holy in this world: Carbonated drinks. Exotic sportscars. Lovely ladies. A retro '80s-style soundtrack infused with modern EDM bops. A rubber duckie. And over 9000* memes.

This is no tearjerker. (Though you might end up jerkin' something else.) It's a thrilling social media success story that puts the 'app' in 'happiness'! (And maybe the 'piness' too...)

*Estimated



Now, this is a story all about how
Luna's life got flipped-turned upside down
And I'd like to take a minute
So listen to the story
I'll tell you how he helped his friends save an old factory

In coastal Saint Aria, born and raised
With a rubber duckie's how he spends most of his days
Chillin' out, maxin', gettin' all snoozy
And skipping out of class so he can stay in his jacuzzi
When a couple of girls who were heading to class
Skydived to his yard and dragged his lazy ass
Shoved him into car-- At least it wasn't a van--
And said 'It's time to go to the Academy of Hope Island'




Lamune Aoumi : The cool, kind childhood friend.

As an only child, she dreams of inheriting the Aoumi Lamune Factory from her parents.
She loves Luna just as much as she loves lamune.
What's lamune, you ask? It's the traditional soft drink of Japan, served in a marble-stopped bottle.
Hmm? No, I'm pretty sure that's how it's spelled.


Corona Akahoshi : The finest sister ever.

Luna's younger twin sister. Younger by like five minutes, but the point still stands.
She's cunning, clever, and caring.
And she loves Luna.


Iris "CH" Prateado : Too cute. Too crazy.

A lovely, lively little lady.
She loves everyone....
about as much as she loves supersonic attack helicopters.
The "CH" stands for "The Crystal Heart".


Rayla "MC" Prateado : Domo arigato Ms. Perfect.

The sole chef of the Cherry Crown Diner.
Everything she does, she does to perfection.
She's gentle, and reliable, and she loves everyone.
The "MC" stands for "The Million Carat".


Luna Akahoshi : Good guy in the jacuzzi.

He's always chilling in the jacuzzi at home with his best friend, a rubber duckie.
The goodest guy you'll ever meet.


Rubber Duckie : The real protagonist of our story.


Solaris : Say Hi.



Let's see what fabulous features we have in store for you:

  • All-ages version plus a free patch
  • Full Japanese voice acting
  • Memes
  • Japanese, Chinese and English text
  • More memes
  • An awesome 80’s-inspired soundtrack
  • A rubber duckie
  • 30 hours of playtime
  • Did we mention memes???

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains sexual references, crude jokes, swearing, and references to drug and alcohol use.

name: LAMUNATION! -international-

steam_germany.descriptors:
Sexuelle Andeutungen
Derbe Sprache
Alkohol / Tabak

short_description: Now, this is a story all about how, Luna's life got flipped-turned upside down... Kick back at the Cherry Crown Diner with a cast of quirky heroines in this meme-tastic visual novel that's fizzing with extreme happiness.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
